services_description: Explore my web development and design services.
contact_description: Get in touch with us for more information.
introduction: Hi, my name is Juan. I am a designer and web developer with more than 10 years of experience. I create custom digital solutions: web development, e-commerce, branding, and SEO strategies. My goal is to enhance your online presence.
services_text: Do you need everything to be managed from scratch? Let's collaborate to design and build a custom website that reflects your brand, meets your goals, and connects with your users. From the initial strategy and wireframes to the design, functionalities, and final development, I take care of the entire process. The result is a fast, responsive, and accessible website, carefully crafted with the most advanced technologies.
trabajos_description: Explore a selection of our most recent works, where we combine innovative design and robust development to create digital solutions that generate impact. Each project is a testament to our dedication to quality and tangible results.
arami_title: Arami Studio: Web Design and Branding
arami_summary: Development of a modern website and a cohesive brand identity for Estudio Arami, focusing on an intuitive user experience and an attractive visual design that reflects their professionalism.
coyuyo_summary: Creation of an interactive platform for an organization dedicated to promoting the use of medicinal cannabis in Latin America, highlighting it as the first medical cannabis center in the region.

barrio_summary: Management tool for a private neighborhood with users, access control, technology that facilitates communication and expense management, facilitating communication between owners and the administration.

tienda_summary: Implementation of a complete virtual store with integrated payment gateways, WhatsApp sales, and conversion optimization, providing an efficient and scalable sales platform.
about_me_text: My name is Juan Manuel Esparré, I am 39 years old and I live in San Luis, Argentina. I am a creative developer who has always been curious about how things work. I love creating things that are not only functional, but also intuitive and a little charming. Whether it's a micro-interaction or a complete experience, I believe that good design is in the details. I work best when I am part of the entire process — from the first idea to the last line of code. Whether designing and developing from scratch, or bringing an existing design to life with clean and responsive development, I focus on creating digital experiences that just feel right.
ecommerce_text: I create virtual stores and payment systems that allow you to sell your products or services online in a way that suits your needs. From the configuration of payment gateways to inventory management.
ecommerce_feature3: Custom design and intuitive user experience
desarrollo_web_title: Web Development: Your Professional Online Presence
desarrollo_web_text: I create custom websites and applications with functionalities to achieve your business goals. From optimized landing pages to complex web platforms, I focus on user experience, scalability, and the integration of the latest technologies to ensure your digital success.
desarrollo_web_feature2: Agile development and fast response times
diseno_text: Your ideas in visual experiences. Graphic design and UX/UI services ranging from the creation of logos, illustrations, to the design of intuitive and attractive user interfaces for websites and applications.
diseno_feature3: Graphic material for web and social networks
gestion_text: I develop and implement custom systems to optimize your internal processes, improve customer relationships, and efficiently manage your content. Solutions that allow you to centralize information, automate tasks, and make strategic decisions based on data.
seo_title: SEO Web Positioning: Increase Your Online Visibility
seo_text: I implement SEO (Search Engine Optimization) strategies to improve your website's ranking. Through keyword optimization, content, technical structure, and link building, I increase your visibility and attract traffic to stand out in Google searches.
precios_fijos_text: Web development packages with fixed prices, designed to give you transparency and control over your investment. Ideal for entrepreneurs and small businesses looking for a professional online presence without hidden costs.
